SwiftMessageFormat.name: MT082
SwiftMessageFormat.DescriptiveName: Undelivered Message Report at a Fixed Hour
SwiftMessageFormat.Description:
This message is generated at a time, local to the user, requested in an MT 044 Undelivered Report Rules Redefinition, and lists all undelivered messages at generation time.
SWIFT has developed a process that is designed to generate UNDELV reports that reflect the situation no more than 15 minutes before the event that led to the cold start. The report is in the form of the MT 082 Undelivered Message Report at a Fixed Hour. Delivery of this special UNDELV report occurs through the normal channels, once the user's FIN logical terminal has successfully logged in and selected the FIN service.
From: FIN To: User

SystemField.Name: reporting-options
SystemField.description:
Reporting Options, where:
a) RT = all undelivered at report time
b) nn = undelivered for more than nn hours (range: 00 < nn < 24)
c) VD = value-date-sensitive message undelivered after the Receiver's cut-off time on the value date.

SystemField.Name: report-line
SystemField.description:
For each message, the report line gives:
a) The time, local to the sender, when the message entered the system
b) The MIR of the message being reported
c) The Message Type (of the message being reported)
d) The intended receiver's address
e) The time, local to the receiver, when the last delivery attempt was made

fieldvalidation.name: E1
fieldvalidation.comment: At least one of groups Group_1 or Group_2 is present.
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "At least one of groups Group 1 or Group 2 must be present."

fieldvalidation.name: E2
fieldvalidation.comment: Group_2 indicates the end of a multi-section report, it is always present in a single-section report.
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Group 2 must be present if the message is a single section report";

fieldvalidation.name: E3
fieldvalidation.comment: Group_2 is Mandatory in the last section of the report.
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In a multi section report Group 2 must be present in the last section of the report"

fieldvalidation.name: E4
fieldvalidation.comment: Group_2 is Mandatory in the last section of the report, it is not present in the other sections.
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In a multi section report Group 2 must be present only in the last section of the report"
